definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: Grass will wither and flowers will fall . But the Word of the Lord will remain forever.
sentences.chinese: 草必枯干，花必凋谢，惟有主的道是永存的。

sentences.english: But whoso hearkeneth unto me shall dwell safely, and shall be quiet from fear of evil.
sentences.chinese: 惟有听从我的，必安然居住，得享安静，不怕灾祸。

sentences.english: This crisis can be overcome only if resistance is carried out jointly by the people and the government.
sentences.chinese: 惟有实行民众和政府一致的抗战，才能挽救这个危局。

sentences.english: Only those pre-booked on Malacca excursions may disembark.
sentences.chinese: 惟有已预定马六甲上岸观光活动的乘客方可下船。

sentences.english: And now, LORD, thou art God, and hast promised this goodness unto thy servant
sentences.chinese: 耶和华阿，惟有你是神，你也应许将这福气赐给仆人。

sentences.english: Abandoned by the company, Peter's wife, Alice, must deal with it on her own.
sentences.chinese: 彼得被公司抛下不管，其妻艾莉丝惟有孤军奋战。

sentences.english: There is no remedy for love but to love more.
sentences.chinese: 医治爱的创伤惟有更加地去爱。

sentences.english: He does not forget her spirit until he has possessed her body.
sentences.chinese: 惟有占领了她的身体之后，他才能够忘记她的灵魂。

sentences.english: But one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side, and forthwith came there out blood and water.
sentences.chinese: 惟有一个兵拿枪扎他的肋旁，随即有血和水流出来。

sentences.english: But a certain Samaritan, as he journeyed, came where he was: and when he saw him, he had compassion on him
sentences.chinese: 惟有一个撒玛利亚人，行路来到那里。

sentences.english: While some things may pass away, you know that our love and affection will not.
sentences.chinese: 世事难料，惟有我们的爱和情感不变。

sentences.english: Flowers will fade, grass will wither, but love endures.
sentences.chinese: 花会凋谢，草会干黄，惟有爱是永不衰残。

sentences.english: And now, O LORD, you are God, and you have promised this good thing to your servant.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华啊，惟有你是神，你也应许将这福气赐给仆人。

sentences.english: When all into space, with only my memories.
sentences.chinese: 当一切成空，惟有回忆伴我。

sentences.english: Though your people, O Israel, be like the sand by the sea, only a remnant will return.
sentences.chinese: 以色列阿，你的百姓，虽多如海沙，惟有剩下的归回。

sentences.english: This state will only decapitation, without abandoning the beginning of the world stems San people.
sentences.chinese: 此州惟有断头将，圣世初无弃梗人。

definition: that being the case/then/in that case
entirely/without exception/(literary) to be together/to be alike
lit. the mountains crumble and the trees lie ruined/a great sage has died (idiom)
